translated: Verses of the Elder Nuns .🔽The Collection of Long Discourses
The Elder Nun Sumana, Who Went Forth in Old Age
“You, Sumana, who went forth in old age,
having covered yourself with a robe,
you are cool, and you are fully quenched.”🔽… the elder nun Sumana, who went forth in old age …
… Sumanā, the Elder Nun who went forth when old …
